name: Coin Dropper (ZenriS)
description:
Coin Dropper is an auto runner where you switch between three lanes. You have to avoid cars and crazy people or shoot the crazies to get points. You also get points from coins, but coins are heavy and will decrease your jump and speed. You can drop coins when prompted.

How long will you get before the time runs out?

Controls:

Switch Lane - A/D

Jump - Space

Shoot - Left Ctrl

Pause - Escape

Drop Coins - Arrow Keys

This was game was made for Ludum Dare 40. I didn’t have time to jam all weekend so the game is kinda rushed, but everything should work.

Programs used:

Unity

Adobe Photoshop

Autodesk Maya

bfxr.net

Bosca Ceoil
